s.text: It's the only item that couldn't also serve as the title of a late-night, soft-core movie on Cinemax.
Or to put it another way, voting to recommend impeachment in our advanced democracy was that noted historian and constitutional scholar Mary Bono.
So I'd go easy on the swaggering if I were me.

That's the caption to a grim front-page photo in today's New York Times . Participants are invited to submit a caption sure to appear on the front of any paper the day after the House votes on impeachment.
